verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on MSNBC] [ARGM-TMP: Friday night] , [ARG1: former Deputy Assistant General Harry Litman] addressed the latest judicial opinions issued in the legal cases surrounding Donald Trump and predicted that the president 's lawyer Michael Cohen will be indicted .
